sentences.en: As we chatted, a brightly painted sardine boat dropped anchor.
sentences.cn: 我们正在聊着, 只见一条颜色鲜艳的捕捞沙丁鱼的船抛了锚.

sentences.en: Buy: Milk powder, Sardine, Yeast, Black pepper, Garlic, Chilli.
sentences.cn: 采购: 奶粉, 沙丁鱼, 酵母, 黑胡椒, 大蒜, 红辣椒.

sentences.en: commuters packed like sardines on the evening train
sentences.cn: 晚班火车上挤得像沙丁鱼一样的通勤乘客

sentences.en: Cosmetics Natural Herbs, Sardine, Oil, Leather, Jeans. Herbal and Botanical Products.
sentences.cn: 采购产品化妆品天然的药草, 沙丁鱼, 油, 皮革, 牛仔裤. 草药而植物学的产品.

sentences.en: Each sardine was hooked through both eyes.
sentences.cn: 每一条沙丁鱼都是穿过眼睛挂在钩子上的.

sentences.en: Every bus arrives and leaves packed as fully as a sardine tin.
sentences.cn: 每辆开来和开走的公共汽车都塞得像沙丁鱼罐头一样拥挤.

sentences.en: How to eat: Choose sardines packed in olive or sardine oil.
sentences.cn: 吃法: 选择沙丁鱼包装橄榄油或沙丁鱼油.

sentences.en: The old man unhooked the fish, rebaited the line with another sardine and tossed it over.
sentences.cn: 老人把钓钩从鱼嘴里拔出来, 重新安上一条沙丁鱼作饵,把它甩进海里.

sentences.en: We are packed like sardine all the way home on the bus.
sentences.cn: 我们回家时公车一路上都拥挤不堪.

sentences.en: We urgently need caned Food like sardine and fruit juice which we needed in large quantity.
sentences.cn: 求购罐装食品和果汁,请提供相关的详细资料及报价.

phrases.tran_cn: (像沙丁鱼罐头一样)紧紧地挤在一起，拥挤的
拥挤得像罐头里的沙丁鱼，挤得满满的，拥挤不堪

trans.tran_en: a small young fish that is often packed in flat metal boxes when it is sold as food
